thread.title: Saginaw, Kalamazoo school districts file joint lawsuit against state
thread.title_full: Saginaw, Kalamazoo school districts file joint lawsuit against state

author: Bob Johnson | bob_johnson@mlive.com
title: Saginaw, Kalamazoo school districts file joint lawsuit against state
text: Saginaw Public School District has jointly filed a civil lawsuit with Kalamazoo Public Schools against the state's School Reform Office to maintain control of schools in the district that are at risk of being closed by the state.
